SEARCH
Package tempest_foundation.SubmissionElements

Class MarkSnippet

java.lang.Object
tempest_foundation.SubmissionElements.MarkSnippet
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassE
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassDetails, Function
public abstract class MarkSnippet extends Object implements ClassE
An abstract class representing a snippet of code or content that is graded and commented on.

This class serves as a base for elements that require grading, comments, and compliance with the ClassE interface. It provides shared functionalities such as managing grades, comments, and a total score.

Author:
Jared De Four
